articles.author: ESPNcricinfo staff
articles.title: Asia Cup discussion on the cards at IPL final - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Heads of the Indian, Sri Lankan, Bangladeshi and Afghanistan boards will meet in Ahmedabad but a final decision will be taken only after consultation with the PCB
articles.content: NewsHeads of the Indian, Sri Lankan, Bangladeshi and Afghanistan boards will meet in Ahmedabad but a final decision will be taken only after consultation with the PCB
